Class BCK.GUI.BCKNeuronImage

                                           +----BCK.GUI.BCKImageControl
                                                   |
                                                   +----BCK.GUI.BCKNeuronImage
public class BCKNeuronImage
extends BCKImageControl
implements MouseListener, ActionListener
This is the graphical object which represents a neuron, it contains a reference to the neuron which it represents and a graphic image object which te user sees in the BCKNetworkEditor.

Author:
Eoin Whelan, Tom Doris

BCKNeuronImage(int, BCKNetworkEditor, BCKNeuron, BCKNeuralNetwork)
